Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a healthy plant that has water available to it.
The student can draw a plant that is wilting or not growing due to lack of water.
The student can show the pattern that plants need water to live and grow in their drawings.
The student can depict a sunny environment where plants are thriving.
The student can depict a dark or dry environment where plants are not growing well.
